messages.subject: Tosa Tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Cary was good enough to send me scans of his wonderful Tosa tsuba and has allowed me to post it to share with you all. Here is the link
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, Cary was good enough to send me scans of his wonderful Tosa tsuba and has allowed me to post it to share with you all.

Here is the link http://tinyurl.com/nw86

Here is his information

Mei is Tosa no Kuni ju Myochin Kii Munetoshi.
Haynes (Index of Japanese Sword Fittings and Associated Artists)
records this artist (H 06291.0) as a student of Akasaka Tadatoki.
Died: Ca. 1700.

See Sasano (1994) for a related example. Plate 236.
Attributed to Akasaka Tadamune (4th gen.)
Design of Iris and bridge.

Another example in Sano Bijutsukan Exhibition (Akasaka Tsuba).
Plate 28. Attributed to Akasaka Tadatora (3rd. gen.)

Regards,
Cary Condell

cheers all and thanks again Cary

Rich





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
